de: All of the Ardèche, served on a platter! Marvel at the richness of the Ardèche region. Discover authentic, gourmet, home-made dishes that follow the rhythm of the seasons: typical dishes, local charcuterie and cheeses, chestnuts and many other gastronomic treasures...
ru: All of the Ardèche, served on a platter! Marvel at the richness of the Ardèche region. Discover authentic, gourmet, home-made dishes that follow the rhythm of the seasons: typical dishes, local charcuterie and cheeses, chestnuts and many other gastronomic treasures...
en: All of the Ardèche, served on a platter! Marvel at the richness of the Ardèche region. Discover authentic, gourmet, home-made dishes that follow the rhythm of the seasons: typical dishes, local charcuterie and cheeses, chestnuts and many other gastronomic treasures...
it: All of the Ardèche, served on a platter! Marvel at the richness of the Ardèche region. Discover authentic, gourmet, home-made dishes that follow the rhythm of the seasons: typical dishes, local charcuterie and cheeses, chestnuts and many other gastronomic treasures...
fr: Toute l’Ardèche servie sur un plateau ! Émerveillez-vous avec toute la richesse du terroir ardéchois. Retrouvez des assiettes authentiques, gourmandes et faites maison au rythme des saisons.
nl: De chef en zijn team bieden u een authentieke traditionele keuken: kreken, entrecote, ravioli, tartaar..... en vele andere specialiteiten die uw smaakpapillen zullen verbazen. Het restaurant is gelegen in een sobere en elegante omgeving in het hart van Lamastre.
zh: All of the Ardèche, served on a platter! Marvel at the richness of the Ardèche region. Discover authentic, gourmet, home-made dishes that follow the rhythm of the seasons: typical dishes, local charcuterie and cheeses, chestnuts and many other gastronomic treasures...

de:
Montag, Dienstag, Mittwoch, Donnerstag, Freitag, Samstag: offen

Möglichkeit, bei einer Reservierung von mehr als 10 Gedecken auch am Samstagabend oder anderweitig zu öffnen.
en:
Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday: open

Possibility of opening on Saturday evening or other for a reservation of more than 10 covers.
it:
Lunedì, martedì, mercoledì, giovedì, venerdì, sabato: aperto

Possibilità di aprire il sabato sera o altro per una prenotazione di oltre 10 coperti.
fr:
Lundi, Mardi, Mercredi, Jeudi, Vendredi, Samedi : ouvert

Possibilité d'ouvrir le samedi soir ou autre pour une réservation de plus de 10 couverts.
nl:
Maandag, dinsdag, woensdag, donderdag, vrijdag, zaterdag: open

Mogelijkheid tot opening op zaterdagavond of andere voor een reservering van meer dan 10 couverts.
es:
Lunes, martes, miércoles, jueves, viernes y sábado: abierto

Posibilidad de abrir el sábado por la noche u otro para una reserva de más de 10 cubiertos.

de: Montag, Dienstag, Mittwoch, Donnerstag, Freitag, Samstag, Sonntag: offen
en: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday: open
it: Lunedì, martedì, mercoledì, giovedì, venerdì, sabato, domenica: aperto
fr: Lundi, Mardi, Mercredi, Jeudi, Vendredi, Samedi, Dimanche : ouvert
nl: Maandag, dinsdag, woensdag, donderdag, vrijdag, zaterdag, zondag: open
es: Lunes, martes, miércoles, jueves, viernes, sábado y domingo: abierto
